project_descr: Increase Political Participation of Women in Samoa (IPPWS) aims to increase community awareness of the importance of ensuring women are able to influence the national development processes through increasing their opportunities for political leadership.

outputs.output_descr: Outreach and Education on increased political participation of women through a mentoring programme as well as conduct awareness training for all parliamentary members on the importance of gender equality in decision-making and political governance.

document_name: Increasing Political Participation of Women in Samoa (IPPWS) - FE
Increase Political Participation of Women in Samoa
project_title: increase political participation of women in samoa
